reviews.review:
fuckin amazing

try it out, give it a shot, i did and i don't regret it
Офигенная игра для тех у кого много времени на игры
Still the best f2p class based shooter on the market!!!

One of the best free to play games ive ever played, its full of content for those interested both the og content and the community content. Some would say that "the community is the only thing keeping the game alive" and to be honest i agree, theres a little bit of an issue with hackers on casual matchmaking but most of the time you can just votekick them and well most tf2 players really agree with the votes, more often than not they will be kicked from the match and if they dont you can always find another match.
 
overall a fun game that really got me into pc gaming and that i still play to this very day, characters full of life and with the best advertising i've ever seen, plus you can find fun comics to read in their page 10/10

Do not play this game. It's not worth it. You will have a terrible time. The game is unbalanced, it's more bots than players and it's very hostile to new players. Valve doesn't care about this game anymore. They won't fix it, they won't make it better. This game, as it is, is doomed. Find something else. Play Warframe.
Игра на любителя в которой решает донат, поиграв 1.6 часа я сделал такой вывод. Мультяшный WarFace или Freefire какой-то)

Лично мне игра понравилась. Как любитель овервотча она даже вкатила. Все классы хороши по своему, тиммейты хорошие, враги попадаются сильные что делает игру более интересной. Жаль что мои требования очень малы что опробовать всю игру целиком, но мне хватает и этого.

A MAN HAS FALLEN INTO THE RIVER OF YETI PARK!
START THE MANN.CO CHOPPER! HEY! BUILD THE HELICOPTER AND OFF TO THE RESCUE!

THE NEW YETI PARK COLLECTION FROM MANN.CO CITY!
У меня в команде 4 шпика, 3 инженера и я в соло выиграваю игру.  9боточитеров/10
[h1] This game is a timeless classic. [/h1] Sitting just next to perfection lies this game. Just like Skyrim, you can run it on anything. [b] 5/5 [/b]
i rate this game an indeed

man, this is good, just don't get your hopes up for an update

The only thing wrong with this game is the existence of random critical hits

This Game Is The Best On Steam Its Really Good

Vry fun and cool game and is still cool after many years
это слишком топово для бесплатной игры!
i will sell my left nut if valve adds the heavy update

game is fun to play.classes are great.its even more fun if you play it with your friends.this game isnt perfect tho.it has this dumb matchmaking that sometimes takes up to half an hour to get in to a match to then get a message that someone left the game ,thus having to wait even more.it has cheaters and bots but which game doesnt. its like 7/10
This game has to be played
great fun game that i cant believe how old it is and loads of people still play it
Oyun eskiden güzeldi ama valve sağolsun hiçbir hileci ban yemediğinden çöplüğe dönüyor

>Haven't played in a month, boot it up again because bored
>4 matches in a row with bots outnumbering players
>manage to kick one, then get a votekick called on me by another bot
>gets kicked

10/10 would have my faith in a company destroyed again
this is a good game. where else can i be an austrailian bow hunter who throws jars of urine at people.
i like the part with the hats
I really like the game and there are usually nice people on your team but if they are mean the game has a feature which allows you to mute them which is good.

Скоро Team Fortress 2 исполняется 15 годиков и 5 из них без обновлений... Ставлю класс!

P.S.S: Перф, возьми рефы уже блять, пока Вегаз не спиздил.
An unbelievably good shooter, too bad it's been quite neglected by Valve.
